title: Awesome List Updates on May 27, 2020
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on May 27, 2020 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Asyncio
items.content_text:
### Database Drivers

*   [Piccolo (⭐1.6k)](https://github.com/piccolo-orm/piccolo) - An ORM / query builder which can work in async and sync modes, with a nice admin GUI, and ASGI middleware.
items.content_html:
Database Drivers

  • Piccolo (⭐1.6k) - An ORM / query builder which can work in async and sync modes, with a nice admin GUI, and ASGI middleware.

items.title: Awesome Vue
items.content_text:
### Components & Libraries / Integrations

*   [vue-postgrest (⭐84)](https://github.com/technowledgy/vue-postgrest) - Vue.js integration for postgREST: flexible, powerful and easy to use.
items.content_html:
Components & Libraries / Integrations

  • vue-postgrest (⭐84) - Vue.js integration for postgREST: flexible, powerful and easy to use.

items.title: Webcomponents the Right Way
items.content_text:
### Case Studies

*   [Looking back on five years of web components](https://bitworking.org/news/2019/07/looking-back-on-five-years-of-web-components)

### Component Libraries

*   [elements-sk (⭐29)](https://github.com/google/elements-sk) - Collection of custom elements for "a la carte" web development.
*   [Lume (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/lume/lume) - Custom elements for defining 2D or 3D scenes rendered with CSS3D or WebGL.

### Design Systems

*   [Bolt Design System (⭐291)](https://github.com/boltdesignsystem/bolt) - Twig and Web Component-powered UI components, reusable visual styles and tooling.
items.content_html:
Case Studies

  • Looking back on five years of web components

Component Libraries

  • elements-sk (⭐29) - Collection of custom elements for "a la carte" web development.
  • Lume (⭐1.4k) - Custom elements for defining 2D or 3D scenes rendered with CSS3D or WebGL.

Design Systems

  • Bolt Design System (⭐291) - Twig and Web Component-powered UI components, reusable visual styles and tooling.

items.title: Awesome Broadcasting
items.content_text:
### Codecs

*   [Lame](https://lame.sourceforge.io/) - A high quality MPEG Audio Layer III (MP3) encoder.
*   [Opus](https://www.opus-codec.org/) - A totally open, royalty-free, highly versatile audio codec.
*   [TwoLame](https://www.twolame.org/) - An MPEG Audio Layer 2 (MP2) encoder.

### Animation, Graphics & Video Playout

*   [Macadam (⭐114)](https://github.com/Streampunk/macadam) - Blackmagic Node.js bindings that support HTML/CSS (via [Electron](https://www.electronjs.org/)) and SVG (via [Sevruga (⭐5)](https://github.com/Streampunk/sevruga)) graphics.

### Radio Production

*   [LibreTime](https://libretime.org/) - Radio broadcast & automation platform (fork of Airtime).

### Software-defined radio

*   [Gqrx SDR](https://gqrx.dk/) - An open source software defined radio receiver (SDR).
items.content_html:
Codecs

  • Lame - A high quality MPEG Audio Layer III (MP3) encoder.
  • Opus - A totally open, royalty-free, highly versatile audio codec.
  • TwoLame - An MPEG Audio Layer 2 (MP2) encoder.

Animation, Graphics & Video Playout

  • Macadam (⭐114) - Blackmagic Node.js bindings that support HTML/CSS (via Electron) and SVG (via Sevruga (⭐5)) graphics.

Radio Production

  • LibreTime - Radio broadcast & automation platform (fork of Airtime).

Software-defined radio

  • Gqrx SDR - An open source software defined radio receiver (SDR).

items.title: Awesome Swift
items.content_text:
### TextField / Barcode

*   [CHIOTPField (⭐280)](https://github.com/ChiliLabs/CHIOTPField) - A set of textfields that can be used for One-time passwords, SMS codes, PIN codes, etc.

### Video / Barcode

*   [MobilePlayer (⭐3.1k)](https://github.com/sahin/mobileplayer-ios) - A powerful and completely customizable media player for iOS.
items.content_html:
TextField / Barcode

  • CHIOTPField (⭐280) - A set of textfields that can be used for One-time passwords, SMS codes, PIN codes, etc.

Video / Barcode

  • MobilePlayer (⭐3.1k) - A powerful and completely customizable media player for iOS.

items.title: Awesome Deep Learning
items.content_text:
### Researchers / Datasets

*   [MIT Vision Texture](https://vismod.media.mit.edu/vismod/imagery/VisionTexture/vistex.html) - Image archive (100+ images) (Formats: ppm)
items.content_html:
Researchers / Datasets

  • MIT Vision Texture - Image archive (100+ images) (Formats: ppm)

items.title: Public Apis
items.content_text:
### Geocoding

- API: [Geoapify](https://www.geoapify.com/api/geocoding-api/)

  Description: Forward and reverse geocoding, address autocomplete

  Auth: `apiKey`

  HTTPS: Yes

  CORS: Yes
items.content_html:
Geocoding

  • API: Geoapify

    Description: Forward and reverse geocoding, address autocomplete

    Auth: apiKey

    HTTPS: Yes

    CORS: Yes

items.title: Awesome Creative Coding
items.content_text:
### Books

*   [Synthèse d'images avec OpenGL (ES)](https://www.d-booker.fr/opengl/78-synthese-d-images.html) - Book in french, which covers OpenGL, OpenGL ES and WebGL.

### Online Books

*   [XEM WebGL Guide](https://xem.github.io/articles/webgl-guide.html) - Step-by-step guide to WebGL.

### Schools • Workshops / Other

*   [UAL Creative Computing Institute](https://www.arts.ac.uk/creative-computing-institute) - school in London working at the intersection of creativity and computational technologies

### Blogs • Websites / Other

*   [jsdo.it-archives (⭐13)](https://github.com/cx20/jsdo.it-archives) - Compilation of WebGL experiments including comparisons on WebGL frameworks and physics engine (oimo.js, cannon.js, ammo.js)
*   [WebAudio Weekly](https://www.webaudioweekly.com/) - Newsletter to know everything about the WebAudio API
items.content_html:
Books

  • Synthèse d'images avec OpenGL (ES) - Book in french, which covers OpenGL, OpenGL ES and WebGL.

Online Books

  • XEM WebGL Guide - Step-by-step guide to WebGL.

Schools • Workshops / Other

  • UAL Creative Computing Institute - school in London working at the intersection of creativity and computational technologies

Blogs • Websites / Other

  • jsdo.it-archives (⭐13) - Compilation of WebGL experiments including comparisons on WebGL frameworks and physics engine (oimo.js, cannon.js, ammo.js)
  • WebAudio Weekly - Newsletter to know everything about the WebAudio API

items.title: Awesome Cheminformatics
items.content_text:
### Resources / Blogs

*   [Cheminformatics 2.0](https://cheminf20.org/) - Blog of [Alex M. Clark](https://twitter.com/aclarkxyz), a research scientist at Collaborative Drug Discovery.
*   [Depth-First](https://depth-first.com/) - Blog of [Richard L. Apodaca](https://depth-first.com/about/), a chemist living in La Jolla, California.

### See Also / Books

*   [MolSSI Molecular Software Database](https://molssi.org/software-search/)
    ＊[Pages created by Tobias Kind, PhD](https://fiehnlab.ucdavis.edu/staff/kind/metabolomics)
items.content_html:
Resources / Blogs

  • Cheminformatics 2.0 - Blog of Alex M. Clark, a research scientist at Collaborative Drug Discovery.
  • Depth-First - Blog of Richard L. Apodaca, a chemist living in La Jolla, California.

See Also / Books

  • MolSSI Molecular Software Database ＊Pages created by Tobias Kind, PhD

items.title: Awesome Aws
items.content_text:
### Open Source Repos / DevOps

*   [k1LoW/awspec :fire::fire::fire::fire: (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/k1LoW/awspec) - RSpec tests your resources.
items.content_html:
Open Source Repos / DevOps

  • k1LoW/awspec 🔥🔥🔥🔥 (⭐1.2k) - RSpec tests your resources.

items.title: Awesome Actions
items.content_text:
### GitHub Tools and Management / Docker Container Actions

*   [Update Configured GitHub Actions to the Latest Versions (⭐9)](https://github.com/fabasoad/ghacu)
*   [Remove Old Artifacts (⭐360)](https://github.com/c-hive/gha-remove-artifacts)

### Monitoring / Code Coverage

*   [Check bundlephobia (⭐51)](https://github.com/carlesnunez/check-my-bundlephobia) - Comments new and modified package size according to bundlephobia.io website and rejects PR on threshold surpassed.
items.content_html:
GitHub Tools and Management / Docker Container Actions

  • Update Configured GitHub Actions to the Latest Versions (⭐9)
  • Remove Old Artifacts (⭐360)

Monitoring / Code Coverage

  • Check bundlephobia (⭐51) - Comments new and modified package size according to bundlephobia.io website and rejects PR on threshold surpassed.
